@deathschaos9 wrote:

Thatâ€™s not a weird error, the variable WanneShop is private, meaning it can only be accessed from the class its declared in. Go into Client class and change its modifier from private to public.

item.title: Weirdest error ever!
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

Oke i tried to make if i click on a item it opens a shop i made al codes and stuff but i get this error:

.\src\UseItem.java:19: WanneShop has private access in Client c.WanneShop = 3; ^ .\src\UseItem.java:22: WanneShop has private access in Client c.WanneShop = 2; ^ .\src\UseItem.java:25: WanneShop has private access in Client c.WanneShop = 1; ^ .\src\UseItem.java:28: WanneShop has private access in Client c.WanneShop = 4; ^ 4 errors

This is my code in Useitem class:

		[code]case 6799: //general
			c.WanneShop = 3;
		break;
		case 6800: // skiller
			c.WanneShop = 2;
		break;
		case 6801: // Pk
			c.WanneShop = 1;
		break;
		case 6802: //master
			c.WanneShop = 4;
		break;

[/code]

Read full topic
